data.text: @PeltierHQ @KevinHSharp @jbendery @MMFlint @VP @DannyDeVito @tmorello @kevinck04 @JacksonBrowne @ChefArtSmith @AmnestySF30 @SantanaCarlos @CornelWest @MarkRuffalo @ladygaga I just don't get it. There were millions of Natives killed in cold blood by Euros. They should be locked up, not Leonard who has served 46 years for a crime yet to be proven! Oh they let out a rapist. Why? Because Bill Cosby was a TV star? This world has everything upside down

@PeltierHQ @KevinHSharp @jbendery @MMFlint @VP @DannyDeVito @tmorello @kevinck04 @JacksonBrowne @ChefArtSmith @AmnestySF30 @SantanaCarlos @CornelWest @MarkRuffalo @ladygaga @POTUS be ashamed of the #unjust detention of @PeltierHQ .

@PeltierHQ @KevinHSharp @jbendery @MMFlint @VP @DannyDeVito @tmorello @kevinck04 @JacksonBrowne @ChefArtSmith @AmnestySF30 @SantanaCarlos @CornelWest @MarkRuffalo @ladygaga Which issues favoring his alleged innocence were never addressed in his prior court appeals?
